version_description:
Video playing notification controls.

Improved discovery mode for Roku and DLNA.

Crash fixes.

YouTube fixes.

Other bug fixes.

New receiver for streaming devices that do not have one of the protocols supported by this app but have a web browser, like for example the PlayStation 4. This can also be useful on some streaming devices that work with this app but don't support subtitles, like for example the Xbox. Let me know if you have any issues with it, it has been tested extensively but browsers in streaming devices are often lacking a lot of features or work in quirky ways.

Video detection improvements.

Setting to prevent already playing dialog.

Bug fixes.

Local file casting.

Add Roku by IP.

Picture casting.

Audio casting.

Share from other apps to Web Video Caster.

Share from Web Video Caster to other apps.

Audio casting

Some subtitle fixes

Small bug fixes.
Fix for a couple of sites where videos didn't cast.
Crash fix for Javascript alerts.
Crash fix for m3u8 videos.

Better error reporting when casting.

Fix for Chromecast auto reconnecting after disconnect.

1.30

Warning when website loads a bad url.

Dark Mode

Fix iOS 13 iPad "open in another app"

Added alternative Chromecast receiver for m3u8 issues. You have to enable it under settings. This is a test receiver and you should only use it if you have problems with m3u8 videos freezing the Chromecast.

Bug fixes

1.39

Improvements to season/episode parsing for subtitle search.

Automatically mute videos.

Fixes for windows that close themselves.

Fix for photo library.

Audio track switching for streaming devices that support it. On Roku you must use the private beta channel for now. On Fire TV you must sideload the Web Video Caster Receiver. On Apple TV make sure you have the latest receiver.
